title: The Washington Post - 10 Days in September
description:
The Washington Post - 10 Days in September

On Sept. 11, President Bush and his advisers started America on
the road to war, but they did it without a map. In the days
afterward, they deliberated, debated and ultimately settled on
a strategy that is still emerging to fight worldwide terrorism.

This series, by Post reporters Bob Woodward and Dan Balz, is
based on interviews with President Bush, Vice President Cheney
and other key officials. Interviews were supplemented by notes
of National Security Council meetings made available, along with
notes taken by several participants.

(Ran as a series in The Washington Post - January, 2002)

=====================================

Included in this package are several versions:
  HTML
  PDF
  OpenOffice (.odt)
  Microsoft Word (.doc)
  Plain Text (.txt)
